heading: 1.3.1 Project Background / Problem Statement
text: Data new currency fundamental effective, evidence-based decision-making. underpins everything major policy decisions routine operational processing external appraisal variety analytical reasons. Often, however, data unknown questionable quality. presents huge challenges. Poor unknown quality data weakens evidence, undermines trust, ultimately leads poor outcomes. makes organisation less efficient impedes effective decision-making. make better decisions, need better quality data.Improved data quality claimed benefit many portfolio projects. However, currently harmonised method assess . data quality framework, assessment associated automated pipeline address gap provide consistent toolkit aid quality assessment data held within Companies House.Understanding areas concern data quality aid interventions improve overall integrity register. example, understanding extent duplicated addresses, help us inform development work reduce errors, thereby improving integrity register. Improvements terms consistency duplication give us confidence proactively identifying suspicious activity, meaning can trust analysis used inform law enforcement partners helps reduce economic crime.

heading: 2 Data Quality Principles

heading: 2.1 Commit to data quality
text: Create sense accountability data quality across team organisation, make commitment ongoing assessment, improvement reporting data quality.

heading: 2.3 Assess quality throughout the data lifecycle
text: Data managed across lifecycle, paying close attention quality measures assurance stage.

heading: 2.3.2 Assess data quality at all stages of the lifecycle
text:
Quality assurance take place across entire data lifecycle. Data quality issues can occur stage can knock-effects rest lifecycle.
Individuals organisations :assess data quality every stage take proactive measures improve quality issues ariseassess data quality every stage take proactive measures improve quality issues ariseadopt appropriate assessment measures stage rather applying one-size-fits-approach quality assuranceadopt appropriate assessment measures stage rather applying one-size-fits-approach quality assurancefocus quality improvements early lifecycle possible maximise effectivenessfocus quality improvements early lifecycle possible maximise effectiveness

heading: 3.1 The Problem
text:
Good quality evidence key making better decisions. Departments across government collect analyse data wide variety outputs. outputs include official statistics, operational reports predictive models policy making.Reproducible Analytical Pipelines (RAPs) automated statistical analytical processes. incorporate elements software engineering best practice ensure pipelines reproducible, auditable, efficient, high quality.RAPs increase efficiency statistical analytical processes, delivering value. Reproducibility auditability increase trust statistics. pipelines easier quality assure manual processes, leading higher quality.Statisticians analysts look implement RAP principles parts processes.

heading: 3.2 A RAP will:
text:
improve quality analysisimprove quality analysisincrease trust analysis producers, managers usersincrease trust analysis producers, managers userscreate efficient processcreate efficient processimprove business continuity knowledge managementimprove business continuity knowledge managementIn order achieve benefits, minimum RAP must:
minimise manual steps, example copy-paste, point-click drag-drop operations. - absolutely necessary include manual step process must documented described 
built using open source software available anyone, preferably R python
deepen technical quality assurance processes peer review ensure process reproducible requirements met
guarantee audit trail using version control software, preferably Git
open anyone – can facilitated easily use file code sharing platforms
follow existing good practice quality assurance – guidance set departments organisations, Best Practice Impact Data Quality Hub Analysis Function Government Statistical Service
contain well-commented code documentation embedded version controlled within product, rather saved elsewhere

heading: 7.1 The Problem with Addresses
text: ’s extremely common people make errors inputting addresses, including formatting misspelling mistakes. Traditional address matching able determine address exact match, little account different formatting inputs misspellings. Fuzzy logic address matching allows match correct addresses input incorrectly.

heading: 7.2 Fuzzy Logic
text: Fuzzy logic address matching system allows determine address accuracy varying degrees certainty (rather simply determining whether address exactly matches ). can used address matching address standardization, enabling addresses automatically corrected.Fuzzy logic address matching uses advanced algorithms (often AI-powered) accurately find distinguish addresses. ideal identifying address, can still find correct address slightly incorrect search input.Fuzzy logic form determining degrees value fall standard “true false” (0 1) distinctions present Boolean logic. fuzzy logic, maintain absolute truth values 0 1, allow use value truth (partial truths) falls . can used make determinations data, well flag certain pieces data correction.

heading: 7.3 Fuzzy Logic in action
text:
number issues traditional address matching, need data input exactly, including spelling formatting. Fuzzy logic solves number problems traditional address matching :Determine likelihood full match - Rather simply determining full match, predict likelihood full match, allowing make better decisions matching data.
Address misspellings small formatting errors - traditional address matching, address either exact match . fuzzy logic, determines likelihood match, based many characters different.Determine likelihood full match - Rather simply determining full match, predict likelihood full match, allowing make better decisions matching data.
Address misspellings small formatting errors - traditional address matching, address either exact match . fuzzy logic, determines likelihood match, based many characters different.Difficult deduplicate addresses - Without able easily pair addresses, ’s difficult deduplicate address data combine records.Difficult deduplicate addresses - Without able easily pair addresses, ’s difficult deduplicate address data combine records.Distinguishing unique address information - can program exact matches account small differences common formatting (.e. street vs st, lane vs ln, avenue vs ave, etc.), won’t account street names unique address information standard. Fuzzy logic allows set rules address standardization, correcting address information like street names match better accuracy.Distinguishing unique address information - can program exact matches account small differences common formatting (.e. street vs st, lane vs ln, avenue vs ave, etc.), won’t account street names unique address information standard. Fuzzy logic allows set rules address standardization, correcting address information like street names match better accuracy.Impossible identify phonetic variations - simple address matching looking exact match, designed - unable - detect phonetic differences addresses.Impossible identify phonetic variations - simple address matching looking exact match, designed - unable - detect phonetic differences addresses.

heading: 7.4 Geocoding
text: Geocoding process transforming description location—pair coordinates, address, name place—location earth’s surface. can geocode entering one location description time providing many table. resulting locations output geographic features attributes, can used mapping spatial analysis.can quickly find various kinds locations geocoding. types locations can search include points interest names gazetteer, like mountains, bridges, stores; coordinates based latitude longitude reference systems, Military Grid Reference System (MGRS) U.S. National Grid system; addresses, can come variety styles formats, including street intersections, house numbers street names, postal codes.

heading: 7.4.1 What can geocoing be used for
text: simple data analysis business customer management distribution techniques, wide range applications geocoding can used. geocoded addresses, can spatially display address locations recognize patterns within information. can done simply looking information using analysis tools available ArcGIS. can also display address information based certain parameters, allowing analyze information. applications described sections follow.

heading: 7.4.1.1 Address data analysis
text: geocoded addresses, can spatially display address locations begin recognize patterns within information. can done simply looking information using analysis tools available ArcGIS. can also display address information based certain parameters, allowing analyze information.

heading: 7.4.1.2 Customer data management
text:
Geocoding acts crucial part customer data management. Nearly every organization maintains address information customer client. usually tabular format, containing customer name, address, buying habits, information collected. Geocoding allows take customers’ information create map locations. Using variety related applications, can use information many ways, establishing marketing strategies targeting specific clusters customers producing route maps directions. geocoded locations customers can invaluable data.

geocoder returns results, places within (JSON) results array. Even geocoder returns results (address doesn’t exist) still returns empty results array. Note countries, United Kingdom, allow distribution true postal addresses due licensing restrictions.formatted address logically composed one address components. example, address “111 8th Avenue, New York, NY” consists following components: “111” (street number), “8th Avenue” (route), “New York” (city) “NY” (US state).parse formatted address programmatically. Instead use individual address components, API response includes addition formatted address field.address_components[] array containing separate components applicable address.address component typically contains following fields:types[] array indicating type address component.
